messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]homeschool names
messages.msgSnippet: ... are ... school ... Learning differences! that s us! :) But not broken children, indeed no. HeidiC
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, kbcdlovejo@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/12/2003 10:15:42 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
>
> > Sandhill Academy has been ours nearly from the start, because we
are
> > the Cranes! :)
>
> <G> There's a Sandhills Academy here in Columbia, SC. But they're a
school
> for "broken children"---those with "learning differences".
>
> ~Kelly

Learning differences! that's us! :) But not broken children, indeed
no.

HeidiC

> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

~Kelly
